Package lumis.service.hierarchicalcontent

Service that allows you to create and manage hierarchical contents.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BreadCrumbPostLoadProcessor
    Filter the source so only rows that should be rendered by the bread crumb interface are kept(selected content and his parents)
    ContentChildrenPostLoadProcessor
    Filters the source keeping only the children of the selected content and their children up to the defined depth
    ContentMenuPostLoadProcessor
    Filters the source keeping only parents of the selected source that start at the specified depth up to the limit depth provided.
    FriendlyUrlResolver
    Resolves the friendly url for hiearchical contents
    HierarchicalContent
    A content for hierarchical relations
    HierarchicalContentClearServiceCacheProcessActionHandler
    Clears the service instance cache
    HierarchicalContentDeleteDataProcessActionHandler
    Validates all selected contents for deletion.
    HierarchicalContentHierarchyValidationProcessActionHandler
    Process Action to prevent adding a child content as a parent content
    HierarchicalTabularDataControl
    This control sets the links properly depending on the content type
    SetParentNamePostLoadProcessor
    Fills the parentName of each row on the source with their parent content title

Package lumis.service.hierarchicalcontent Description

Service that allows you to create and manage hierarchical contents.

Since:
8.0.0
